name: batch_enhance_tasks_ollama
description: Batch process tasks using local AI (Ollama) for privacy-focused title/description enhancement. Processes large numbers of tasks efficiently without external API calls.

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to process (default: 50)

skip_existing.description: Skip tasks that already have enhanced titles/descriptions (default: true)

batch_size.description: Number of tasks to process in parallel (default: 5)
